speaker: Mumma
text: Kya bolta hai Circuit, yeh Black Sabbath ka final concert hai, Villa Park mein?

speaker: Circuit
text: Bhai, yeh Villa Park kidhar hai? Aur yeh Black... Black kya bol rahe hai? Black Coffee?

speaker: Mumma
text: Arey buddhu, Black Sabbath ek band hai, rock band. Aur Villa Park Birmingham mein hai, England mein. Apne ko kya, apun toh Mumbai mein hai.

speaker: Circuit
text: Oh, band hai kya? Toh yeh log kya bajayega? Ganpati bappa morya bajayega kya, bhai?

speaker: Mumma
text: Arey yeh log rock and roll bajayega, Circuit. Headbanging karne wala music. Aur Ozzy Osbourne bhi gaane wala hai, sirf chaar gaane, magar phir bhi.

speaker: Circuit
text: Ozzy? Woh kaun hai, bhai? Woh apna udhar ka Ozzy contractor hai kya, jo rasta banata hai?

speaker: Mumma
text: Nahi re, yeh Ozzy singer hai, bada singer. Parkinson's disease hai usko, lekin phir bhi stage pe aayega. Salute hai usko.

speaker: Circuit
text: Parkinson's? Woh toh bahut bura bimari hai na, bhai? Phir bhi woh stage pe gaayega? Wah, bhai, dil se salute! Apun bhi jayega kya, bhai?

speaker: Mumma
text: Arey, tickets toh 16 minute mein bik gaye. Lekin tension nahi lene ka, livestream hoga. Apun idhar Mumbai mein baithke dekhega, kya bolta hai?

speaker: Circuit
text: Livestream? Woh kya hota hai, bhai? Woh apna cable wala dikhayega kya?

speaker: Mumma
text: Arey, internet pe dekhega, Circuit. Mobile pe ya computer pe. Samjha kya?

speaker: Circuit
text: Oh, internet pe? Theek hai bhai, apun dekhega. Lekin agar boring hua toh apun chai peene jayega, kya bolta hai?

speaker: Mumma
text: Chal, theek hai. Lekin Ozzy ko toh dekhna padega, Circuit. Woh legend hai, legend!
